name: polynomic
description: Advanced utilities to manipulate SVG paths
author: Anthony Dugois <dev.anthonydugois@gmail.com>

scripts.clean: npm run build:clean && npm run docs:clean
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.babel.js src/index.js dist/polynomic.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.babel.js src/index.js dist/polynomic.min.js
scripts.docs: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run build
